feed.title: SimpleX Chat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v5.7.4
entry.content:
New in v5.7.4: - improved networking.

Commits: - android, desktop: fix file menu and icon (#4185) - core: 5.7.4.0 (simplexmq 5.7.4.1: networking improvements) - core: ensure that messages are sent to different members (#4221) - core: 5.7.4.1 - 5.7.4: ios 219, android 212, desktop 48

entry.content:

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v5.8.0
entry.content:
New in v5.8: - private message routing to protect IP addresses (opt-in in this version). - protect IP address when receiving files. - chat themes with wallpapers - set themes for all chats app-wide, per chat profile and per conversation - Android and desktop apps. - some groups permissions can now be granted to admins only. - improved message and file delivery with reduced battery usage. - Persian interface language - Android and desktop apps.

Read more: https://simplex.chat/blog/20240604-simplex-chat-v5.8-private-message-routing-chat-themes.html

Commits: - langs: change 1-2 days to several days on fdroid (#4170) - core: save app themes as map with any text key (#4159) - core: update simplexmq (better subscription management) (#4131) - core: update simplexmq - core: api to differentiate contacts and conversations (#4111) - ui: apply model updates only for active user for switch and ratchet sync events (#4175) - core: command to show duplicate message count (#4172) - core: platform independent encoding for delete command (#4176) - core: 5.8.0.0 - ios: update core library - 5.8-beta.0: ios 216, android 208, desktop 45 - web: fix the links of faq & some other (#4144) - directory: debug logging (#4104) - core: update simplexmq (use MVar for better DB connection concurrency) (#4183) - Merge branch 'stable' - core: message statuses for sending proxies (#4161) - ios: SMP proxy support (#4178) - multiplatform: SMP proxy support (#4179) - multiplatform: SMP proxy configuration buttons (#4188) - core: support message forwarding with custom ttl (#4191) - ui: support message forwarding with custom ttl (#4192) - core: contact disabled event (#4194) - ui: disable send field for disabled connection (based on authErrCounter) (#4193) - blog: Redefining Privacy by Making Hard Choices (#4195) - website: fix links - blog: image - ui: comment smp proxy ui (#4204) - core: 5.8.0.1 (simplexmq: 5.8.0.1, faster reconnection when switching networks) - ios: update core library - 5.8-beta.1: ios 217, android 209, desktop 46 - core: check known relays before file reception, support user approval of unknown relays (#4043) - ios: check known relays before file reception, support user approval of unknown relays (#4044) - android: check known relays before file reception, support user approval of unknown relays (#4196) - core: 5.8.0.2 (simplexmq 5.8.0.2) - 5.8-beta.2: ios 218, android 210, desktop 47 - Merge branch 'stable' - core: logging of chat events (#4216) - core: 5.8.0.3 - Revert "ui: comment smp proxy ui (#4204)" - android, desktop: wallpapers (#4109) - Merge branch 'stable' - ios: update core library 5.8.0.3 - ui: show UI for additional group preferences (SimpleX links and per-role permissions) - 5.8-beta.3: ios 220, android 214, desktop 49 - core: delete connection records when connecting (JOIN) fails (#4233) - core: avoid creating duplicate introductions between group members connecting concurrently (#4235) - android, desktop: enhancements to wallpapers (#4234) - android: fix showing empty notification (#4237) - ui: translations, remove translations for wallpaper names used in exported themes (#4239) - website: translations (#4241) - android: replace new line in Uri before transforming it to URI (#4240) - core: inactive connections/members (#4009) - core: batch send pending group messages (#4242) - android, desktop: close notes tab on switching between chats (#4246) - desktop: prevent corruption of settings file (#4243) - android: show alert of exception while initializing WebView (#4245) - docs/smp-server: expand tor configuration, add security practices (#4228) - core: 5.8.0.4 (simplexmq 5.8.0.7) - ui: v5.8 whats new (#4244) - android, desktop: add Persian interface language - android, desktop: change wallpaper file type from PNG to WebP (#4250) - Revert "android, desktop: change wallpaper file type from PNG to WebP (#4250)" - 5.8-beta.4: ios 221, android 215, desktop 50 - android, desktop: wallpaper fixes (#4251) - core: "/get queues" api to debug agent queues (#4252) - android, desktop: creating wallpapers dir in some situations (#4254) - desktop: performant drawing of wallpaper (#4249) - core: commands to debug subscribed SMP queues (#4253) - ios: allow to save sent file on tap (#4264) - ui: fix filtering of contacts that can be invited to group (#4265) - ios: log file error to console - android, desktop: debug subscribed SMP queues (#4262) - android, desktop: selectable cards for proxy options (#4263) - ios: more sheets will become hidden while protect screen on (#4259) - cli: options for private message routing and fallback mode (#4256) - Merge branch 'stable' - core: 5.8.0.5 (simplexmq 5.8.0.10) - Merge branch 'stable' - 5.8-beta.5: ios 223, android 218, desktop 52 - blog: Protecting Children's Safety Requires End-to-End Encryption - ui: translations (#4273) - website: translations (#4274) - android, desktop: fix member search in group (#4277) - docs: flexible user records rfc (#4205) - 5.8: ios 224, android 219, desktop 53

Android APKs:

SHA2-512(simplex.apk)= e99257007ead7522cdccc3726187ee5340903d45daad73d8e8ad25d394ee6b5ecd3f3e8a83bbe89fc3c9db86303222eec9335c658757f70faaf3e8267aeadfbf

SHA2-512(simplex-armv7a.apk)= 5090a14c2073b43a81f829209805ace6d8978ac05a96e7e2645c5a64652cadfd05fd33183cef322d4a739271df6f1031a82d24d7e8f354a577cc197946152dd2

Desktop apps and CLI:

SHA2-512(simplex-desktop-ubuntu-20_04-x86_64.deb)= 61178e6e1ce602ea14c92bdc411a7b9e4ffa5fd020387939a23d3b2f44277d8672e8cb895c4084352a687b3f49c461d692892d852bd188234d1318499a381b08

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v5.8.1
entry.content:
New in v5.8.1: - fixes in sending/receiving files. - better error reporting when connecting to desktop app. - prevent forwarding to conversations where conversation preferences do not allow message. - Android and desktop apps: - support transparent theme colors for chat message bubbles. - do not reset changed network settings when switching SOCKS proxy on/off - fix swipe to reply when animation is disabled. - fix bug when duplicate group shown in the UI.

Commits: - docs/smp-server: web server pages configuration and statistics update (#4279) - core: fix cancellation of snd files without description (e.g. while being prepared for upload) (#4285) - android, desktop: fixes swipe to reply when animations were disabled in the OS (#4286) - android, desktop: removed additional background under chat bubbles (#4287) - android, desktop: prevent duplication of group in UI when creating one (#4284) - android, desktop: enter app logic (#4288) - blog: v5.8 announcement (#4275) - blog: update image - website: update MoneroKon group link - core: update simplexmq (remove protocol encodings) (#4272) - core: file errors (#4261) - ios: file errors (#4281) - multiplatform: file errors (#4289) - core: fix testXFTPRcvError test - core: update simplexmq (upload chunks after preparation) (#4299) - docs: change smp webpage path (#4307) - desktop: change thread who responsible for writting settings (#4311) - desktop: close chat view when chat is stopped (#4313) - core: differentiate RCP error in view, test (#4310) - ui: differentiate remote ctrl errors, better error texts (#4302) - android, desktop: socks proxy toggle enhancements (#4312) - v5.6 -> v5.8 (#4308) - ios: prevented error on desktop in lack of camera permissions (#4306) - web: update copyright year 2023->2024 (#4297) - web: glossary fix (#4298) - web: design fixes eg: blog titles & link wrap (#4305) - web: update feed (#4255) - cli: option to confirm up migrations (#4150) - core: api to reconnect single server (#4317) - core: fix preference application (#4330) - core: fix markdown check (#4334) - core: 5.8.1.0 - Revert "web: glossary fix (#4298)" - ios: update core library to 5.8.1 - ios: check preferences before forward (#4336) - ios: fix search disappearing in forward view (#4337) - multiplatform: check preferences before share/forward (#4338) - 5.8.1: ios 225, android 221, desktop 54

Android apps:

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v5.8.2
entry.content:
New in v5.8.2: - missed call notification. - remove notifications of hidden/removed user profiles. - support for faster connection with the new contacts (disabled in this version). - fixes.

Commits: - docs: update chat protocol (#4344) - core: servers summary api (#4319) - docs: more additions to chat protocol (#4355) - docs: update donation addresses - Merge branch 'stable' - flatpak: add desktop and metainfo (#4366) - website: update join team - core: fix markdown for trailing / and ) characters in the links (#4357) - Update XFTP-SERVER.md (#4184) - Merge branch 'stable' - flatpak: verify app (#4379) - core: remove legacy agent stats (#4375) - ui: add ServerEnabled type (#4381) - core: update simplexmq (disable fast handshake) (#4388) - core: servers - android, desktop: handle situation when not all databases created before shut down (#4294) - core: 5.8.2.0, simplexmq: 5.8.2.0 - android, desktop: notifications improvement (missed call, hidden user) (#4389) - android, desktop: close modals only for desktop (#4390) - 5.8.2: ios 226, android 223, desktop 55

Android APKs:

SHA2-512(simplex.apk)= 5a6b36bd90f7cce70b974bfa4dde83635f4d48517c8a5cc4157a8290dc29009975f2ca18a4f9431c8dabadfa8a7cf417593e366914e6c75bff2adfed38909c88
